name: lammps-generic
title: Generic LAMMPS
description: Accepts path to LAMMPS project folder & .lmp filename as entry point for a simulation.
content:
Bring Your Own LAMMPS

Upload your own LAMMPS (Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel Simulator) input scripts and data files to Stash. Specify the script location and name in the app parameters, then launch your simulation. Learn more about LAMMPS here.
